article_text:
Price undisclosed; to become final by end of 2015

Providence leaders miscalculated in the 1990s

“It’s all about the money”

article_metadata.news-keywords: Columbia, sc, hospital, sold, providence, catholic, lifepoint, brentwood, tenn., publicly traded, sisters of charity, lexington medical, palmetto richland
article_metadata.description: Little will change for patients with Providence Hospital’s impending sale to a for-profit company, observers predicted Tuesday. But those observers have long-term concerns about how the sale will play out.
article_metadata.title: Trends, finances drove Providence Hospital sale | The State
